transcript:
Customer: Ye to sach hai ke bhagwan hai, hai magar phir bhi anjaan hai.

Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir, usme aawaz nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Haan haan usme aawaz nahi, dusra koi mobile hai aapke paas abhi?
Customer: Haan? 
Executive: Second koi mobile hai, kisi family member ka ya aapka hi?
Customer: Aur koi mobile?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan hai.
Executive: To usse aap chaho to mai usse usse call kar deta hu jisse ki ye cheez mai clear kar du.
Customer: Ho jayega?
Customer: Haan ho jayega, mail id dikhao.
Executive: Haan mail id.
Customer: Dekho sir L O C H
Executive: Ye ye aapki jo meeting hai sir ye already generated hai. Aap chaho to aapki jo mail aayi hai na,
Executive: Aap usko forward kar do us directly.
Customer: Usko forward kar do?
Executive: Haan sirf forward kar do aap. Ya chaho to mai whatsapp pe bhej du aapke.
Customer: Isi ko bhej do aap.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Mai isi ko bhej do mai mail id kholta hu iski.
Executive: Haan. Accha mai dobara bhej du mai.
Customer: Bolu?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: L O C H
Executive: L O C H
Customer: Haan.
Executive: L O C H
Customer: R A J
Executive: R
Executive: R R A J
Customer: T S H
Executive: T S H, T for tiger, right? T S H
Customer: E E E S H
Executive: E S H, okay.
Customer: Rajesh.
Customer: 27@gmail.com
Executive: 27@gmail.com
Executive: Ye hai aapka L O C H Rajesh 27@gmail.com, right?
Customer: Okay.

Executive: Theek hai, subah wali bhi maine cancel ki hai, second time wali. Ek mail par bhi maine bheja hua hai, aapki primary aur is mail pe meeting ki link gayi hai abhi.

Executive: Rajeshwar official okay.


Executive: Theek hai sir, try kar lijiye.


Executive: Ji. Hello.
Executive: Abhi aap dekhoge sir aapko? Thoda hold karna please aap.
Executive: Ya.
(Hold music)
(Hold music)
(Hold music)
Customer: Ye dekho sir.
Customer: Mai aapko sir baad me call karte hai yaar idhar gaadi me kuch dikh raha nahi hai.
Customer: Dikh raha hai?
Customer: Awaaz nahi aa rahi ab aapki.
Customer: Dikh raha hai sir.
Customer: Dikh raha hai?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Kya dikhau bolo?
Executive: Jo aapka IndiaMART ka jo panel panel hai apna chrome open kijiye.
Executive: Abhi ke liye tab tak nahi chal raha hai. Haan baad me karte hai aap baad me phone karoge? Mai aapke number pe phone karunga tab.
Executive: Theek hai sir, koi dikkat nahi. WhatsApp me number jab jo WhatsApp me number aaya na us pe phone karunga mai aapko.
Executive: Theek hai sir, koi dikkat nahi. Okay sir, okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to hear the executive.

- Customer needs help with meeting link.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the meeting link on email.

- Executive offered to share the link on WhatsApp.

- Customer will call later due to visibility issues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting link, email, whatsapp, call back
